ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] what deciding rule is used instead of ContentTypeRegExpFilter
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I believe you re looking for org.archive.crawler.deciderules.ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecideRule. Let us know if that works for you... -Paul

Hi,

I believe you're looking for  
org.archive.crawler.deciderules.ContentTypeMatchesRegExpDecideRule.  
Let us know if that works for you...

-Paul

On Jul 23, 2007, at 4:48 AM, ahmed ghouzia wrote:

> I want to use  heritrix 1.12.0 to download only html docs , for  
> that I need to use the ContentTypeRegExpFilter and let it be text/ 
> html.*  .
>
> What is the deciding rule that can be used to do this task ??
>
> All The Best
